sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_acf91679dbc4a3004d77f3c61d96193e
sys_update_xml.payload: c.panel-body { padding: 0px !important; .show { padding: 10px; } .text { overflow: hidden; } .no-issues { padding: 10px; } .each-issue { padding: 10px; border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd; a { display: flex; align-items: center; img { width: 30px; margin-right: 10px; } } .summary { font-size: 14px; line-height: 1; margin-bottom: 5px; } .desc { font-size: 11px; margin-bottom: 0px; line-height: 1; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; height: 12px; } } } sp_instancefalsepe-my-jira-issuesfalsePE My JIRA Issues[ { "name": "limit", "section": "other", "default_value": "5", "label": "Limit", "type": "integer" }, { "name": "title", "section": "other", "label": "Title", "type": "string" }, { "name": "issues", "section": "other", "default_value": "Assigned to me", "label": "Issues", "type": "choice", "choices": [ { "label": "Assigned to me", "value": "Assigned to me" }, { "label": "Created by me", "value": "Created by me" } ] } ] falsefalsesp_widgetsush.chan2018-08-21 16:20:55falseacf91679dbc4a3004d77f3c61d96193e36PE My JIRA Issues47df46b1dbc4a3004d77f3c61d961908false47df46b1dbc4a3004d77f3c61d961908sp_widget_acf91679dbc4a3004d77f3c61d96193esteven.gregory2018-08-28 17:54:22
